physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a dog. The dog is sitting down on a grass field. It has dropped ears and droopy eyes. The arm of a person can be seen as the dog is being held. The background of the photograph shows a part of a building as well.
title_text: Dog belonging to the 'JAG' (Justice Attorney General) branch Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
